product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
product.tagline: Brighten Up with Vitamin C Power
product.headline: Unlock Radiant Skin with 10% Vitamin C GlowBoost Serum
product.description: Unlock your radiant glow with GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, expertly formulated with 10% Vitamin C to deliver unparalleled brightening and dark spot-fading benefits. This potent serum combines the antioxidant power of Vitamin C with the hydrating properties of Hyaluronic Acid, creating a synergistic effect that leaves your skin looking smoother, brighter, and more even-toned. Perfect for oily and combination skin types, GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is the ultimate solution for a more luminous complexion. By harnessing the full potential of Vitamin C, this serum helps to fade dark spots and reveal a more radiant, glowing you.

ingredient_details.name: Vitamin C
ingredient_details.description: A potent antioxidant that helps brighten and even out skin tone, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, and protecting the skin from environmental stressors.

ingredient_details.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredient_details.description: A natural humectant that retains moisture in the skin, providing long-lasting hydration, plumping, and firming the skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and supple.

detailed_benefits.description: Enhances skin radiance and gives a more even-toned complexion, leaving your skin looking brighter and more vibrant.
Helps to reduce the appearance of hyperpigmentation, fading dark spots and acne scars, resulting in a more uniform skin tone.

how_to_use.raw_instructions: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen
how_to_use.summary: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

steps: Apply 2-3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum to your face and neck in the morning
Gently massage the serum into your skin until fully absorbed
tips: Use before applying sunscreen for optimal results

precautions: Perform a patch test before using GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum, especially if you have sensitive skin, as it may cause mild tingling
Avoid using the serum on broken or irritated skin
Discontinue use if irritation persists or worsens
who_should_avoid: Individuals with sensitive skin who are prone to allergic reactions
Those with rosacea, eczema, or other skin conditions that may be exacerbated by vitamin C
expanded_safety.storage: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and out of reach of children
